content: Hey, are https://leanprover-community.github.io/leanproject.html and https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib-tools the only places where I can find information about the command "leanproject build". I want to build the project https://github.com/b-mehta/topos and it gets stuck on some line for a very long time. So I want to understand why.
There is nothing specific to leanproject here. Once it did its magic of downloading a precompiled mathlib then it does nothing more than running lean --make src in the root folder of the project.
Nice, thank you. I was puzzled about the role of "leanproject build".
Esteban Castillo Vargas has marked this topic as resolved.
You may also want to read https://leanprover-community.github.io/toolchain.html if you feel the need to understand better how different pieces fit together.
